title: Business, Balance and Bliss: How the B3 Method Can Transform Your Career and Life
description: Is it getting harder to find success in your career? Has your work become mechanical or routine? Business expert ad keynote speaker Amy Vetter developed the B3 METHOD as a way to discover and align your authentic self and inner talents with the work you do. Illustrated by her own life lessons, experiences from other successful business leaders, and backed by scientific research, the B3 Method will help you achieve work-life harmony to live a more fulfilled and purposeful life at work and home.
author: Amy Vetter
